languages.text: "Не могу ответить, сударь ван Калокс. Исчислять меру вины еретиков — не моя задача. Когда {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g} оказываются перед врагами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} — время стрелять, а не считать".

"I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."
languages.original_text: "Не могу ответить, сударь ван Калокс. Исчислять меру вины еретиков — не моя задача. Когда {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g} оказываются перед врагами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} — время стрелять, а не считать".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the heretics' guilt. When the Adepta Sororitas appear before enemies of the Imperium — it is time to fire, not count."
"I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the heretics' guilt. When the Adepta Sororitas appear before enemies of the Imperium — it is time to fire, not count."

"I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the heretics' guilt. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not calculate."

"I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the heretics' guilt. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not calculate."

"I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

"I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

languages.text: “我无法回答这个问题，冯·卡洛克斯大师。衡量异端分子的罪过不是我的职责。当{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}出现在{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的面前时，她们要做的不是计算，而是开火。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

traits.locale_text: “我无法回答这个问题，冯·卡洛克斯大师。衡量异端分子的罪过不是我的职责。当{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}出现在{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的面前时，她们要做的不是计算，而是开火。”

languages.text: «No puedo responderle, maestro van Calox. No me corresponde medir la culpa de los herejes. Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} aparece ante los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, acudimos para destruir, no para contar».
languages.original_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo responderle, maestro van Calox. No me corresponde medir la culpa de los herejes. Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} aparece ante los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, acudimos para destruir, no para contar».

languages.text: 「それには答えられない、ヴァン・カロックス殿。異端者の罪を測るのは我の役目ではない。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵の前に現れるのは、罪を数えるときではなく、相手を撃ち殺すときなのだ」
languages.original_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

traits.locale_text: 「それには答えられない、ヴァン・カロックス殿。異端者の罪を測るのは我の役目ではない。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵の前に現れるのは、罪を数えるときではなく、相手を撃ち殺すときなのだ」

languages.text: "Das kann ich nicht beantworten, Meister van Calox. Es fällt nicht in meine Pflicht, die Schuld von Ketzern zu messen. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} vor Feinden des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} steht – dann wird geschossen, nicht gezählt."
languages.original_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

traits.locale_text: "Das kann ich nicht beantworten, Meister van Calox. Es fällt nicht in meine Pflicht, die Schuld von Ketzern zu messen. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} vor Feinden des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} steht – dann wird geschossen, nicht gezählt."

languages.text: « Je ne peux répondre à cette question, maître van Calox. Il ne m'incombe pas de jauger la culpabilité des hérétiques. Quand l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adapta Sororitas{/g} fait face aux ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, elle ouvre le feu, elle ne compte pas. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux répondre à cette question, maître van Calox. Il ne m'incombe pas de jauger la culpabilité des hérétiques. Quand l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adapta Sororitas{/g} fait face aux ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, elle ouvre le feu, elle ne compte pas. »

languages.text: "Cevap vermek bana düşmez Üstat van Calox. Görevim, kâfirlerin suçlarını yargılamak değil. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} düşmanlarının karşısına ateş etmeye çıkar, küfür saymaya değil."
languages.original_text: "I cannot answer that, Master van Calox. It is not my duty to measure the guilt of heretics. When the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} appear before enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — it is time to fire, not count."

traits.locale_text: "Cevap vermek bana düşmez Üstat van Calox. Kâfirlerin suçunu yargılamak değil görevim. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} düşmanlarının karşısına ateş etmeye çıkar, küfür saymaya değil."
